tool_description: Fetch data from the Whatsapp network.
name: Whatsapp Scraper
title: Whatsapp Scraper

api_list.name: Fetch profile picture
api_list.description: Gets the whatsapp number profile picture url.

required_parameters.name: phone
required_parameters.description:
The phone number must be written as a number (including countrycode); 
do **NOT** include: any non-number character, spaces, or anything which is not a number; do **NOT** add zeros (0) at the beginning.

api_list.name: Fetch business info
api_list.description: The endpoint will provide: `description`, `website`, `email`, `business hours`, `address` and `category`; if the number is a whatsapp for business account.

required_parameters.name: phone
required_parameters.description:
The phone number must be written as a number (including countrycode); 
do **NOT** include: any non-number character, spaces, or anything which is not a number; do **NOT** add zeros (0) at the beginning.

api_list.name: Is whatsapp for business?
api_list.description: Requests to this endpoint will return `true` if the number is a **Whatsapp for Business** account, or `false` if it's not.

required_parameters.name: phone
required_parameters.description:
The phone number must be written as a number (including countrycode); 
do **NOT** include: any non-number character, spaces, or anything which is not a number; do **NOT** add zeros (0) at the beginning.

api_list.name: About
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the `About` info of the Whatsapp for business number, and when the value was set.

required_parameters.name: phone
required_parameters.description:
The phone number must be written as a number (including countrycode); 
do **NOT** include: any non-number character, spaces, or anything which is not a number; do **NOT** add zeros (0) at the beginning.

api_list.name: Is registered on whatsapp?
api_list.description: This endpoint returns `true` if the phone is registered on whatsapp.

required_parameters.name: phone
required_parameters.description:
The phone number must be written as a number (including countrycode); 
do **NOT** include: any non-number character, spaces, or anything which is not a number; do **NOT** add zeros (0) at the beginning.
